title: Resolutionist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Attack a player a number of times equal to the number of days after December 31st, 2023 it is currently, based on the host's timezone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Your attack and defense strengths are at the nth level, where n is equal to the number of days after December 31st, 2023 it is currently, based on the host's timezone.
__**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Mafia Goal, or Daily Streak Goal

desc:
Post 4649
*I get stronger every day... because I made a 2024 New Year's Resolution.*
